struct asmjit::BaseCpu
#include <cpu.h>

Base cpu information.

Public Type

Anonymous enum

Values:

  • kFeaturesPerUInt32 = static_cast<int>(sizeof(uint32_t)) * 8 -
Public Functions

BaseCpu(uint32_t size = sizeof( BaseCpu ))

const char * getVendorString()

Get CPU vendor string.

const char * getBrandString()

Get CPU brand string.

uint32_t getVendorId()

Get CPU vendor ID.

uint32_t getFamily()

Get CPU family ID.

uint32_t getModel()

Get CPU model ID.

uint32_t getStepping()

Get CPU stepping.

uint32_t getCoresCount()

Get CPU cores count (or sum of all cores of all procesors).

bool hasFeature(uint32_t feature)

Get whether CPU has a feature.

BaseCpu & addFeature(uint32_t feature)

Add CPU feature.

Public Members

uint32_t _size

Size of the structure in bytes.

char _vendorString[16]

Cpu short vendor string.

char _brandString[64]

Cpu long vendor string (brand).

uint32_t _vendorId

Cpu vendor id (see asmjit::kCpuVendor enum).

uint32_t _family

Cpu family ID.

uint32_t _model

Cpu model ID.

uint32_t _stepping

Cpu stepping.

uint32_t _coresCount

Cpu cores count (or sum of all CPU cores of all processors).

uint32_t _features[4]

Cpu features bitfield.

Public Static Functions

Detect number of cores (or sum of all cores of all processors).
